title: Can i fall from silver 5 to Bronze 1
body: just started playing ranked this season and got placed into Silver 5. i want to get the season rewards but can i fall down just by losing games. And how many does it take to fall?

replies.body:
Noone can tell you the exact number, but indeed you have to reach Bronze V MMR to do so ... the simpliest solution is : "stop playing ranked" 

play more normals, get better and then you wouldn't worry about "falling" in bronze, but climbing out of silver ;)

shameless plug for a guide for it : 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/88ATNtFV-guide-how-to-get-out-of-bronzesilver-tier-season-6-version

You can Demote to Bronze 1 from Silver 5. You need to have the MMR of a Bronze 5 to do it however, there is no safe period but if you're FRESH silver V it'd take like 8 - 12 Losses on 0 to tank that much MMR. Dosen't Necessarily have to be straight you could win 1 lose 3 win 1 lose 2 win 2 lose 4 win 1 lose 3 and demote.
I'd like to point out that you're Safe from Decay until platinum so if you don't mind waiting it out that's always and option if you're unsure.

Yes if you continue to lose games while on 0lp you can drop down to bronze 1.
I think you have 5 games after reaching silver 5 where you are safe and can't drop but after those 5 games are played the safety net is gone. If all you're wanting is the loading screen border and your icon for silver then you don't need to play anymore ranked games this season.
If you were silver last season you can't drop to bronze once you've got into silver, if that makes sense

happened to my friend a few hours ago, 

hope that answers your question
Yes you can fall down but it takes alot of games to do that
